mapper.select: select nvl(sum(payment), 0) as today_income, nvl(count(reservation_num), 0) as today_reservation from reservation_fa where TO_CHAR(reservation_date, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')
select count(airplane_id) as today_flight from route_fa where TO_CHAR(departure_date, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')

select * from ( select rou.departure_name, rou.arrival_name, a.airplane_type,min(rou.normal_price) as price, count(*) count from reservation_fa r, schedule_fa s, route_fa rou, airplane_fa a where r.reservation_num = s.reservation_num and r.reservation_date >= add_months(sysdate,-12) and s.route_num = rou.route_num and rou.airplane_id = a.airplane_id group by rou.departure_name, rou.arrival_name, a.airplane_type order by count desc) where rownum <=5

select to_char(b.dt, 'YY-MM') as reservation_date, nvl(sum(a.payment), 0) payment from ( select to_char(reservation_date, 'YY-MM-DD') as reservation_date, sum(payment) as payment from reservation_fa where reservation_date between to_date(add_months(sysdate,-12)) and to_date(add_months(sysdate,0)) group by reservation_date ) a , ( select to_date(add_months(sysdate, - 11) ,'YY-MM-DD') + level - 1 as dt from dual connect by level < = (to_date(sysdate,'YY-MM-DD') - to_date(add_months(sysdate, -11),'YY-MM-DD') + 1) ) b where to_char(b.dt, 'YY-MM-DD') = a.reservation_date(+) group by to_char(b.dt, 'YY-MM') order by to_char(b.dt, 'YY-MM')

select to_char(b.dt, 'MM.DD') as reservation_date, nvl(sum(a.count), 0) count from ( select to_char(reservation_date, 'YY-MM-DD') as reservation_date, count(reservation_num) as count from reservation_fa where reservation_date between to_date(add_months(sysdate,-12)) and to_date(add_months(sysdate,0)) group by reservation_date ) a , ( select to_date(sysdate - 4, 'YY-MM-DD') + level - 1 as dt from dual connect by level < = (to_date(sysdate,'YY-MM-DD') - to_date(sysdate - 4,'YY-MM-DD') + 1 ) ) b where to_char(b.dt, 'YY-MM-DD') = a.reservation_date(+) group by to_char(b.dt, 'MM.DD') order by to_char(b.dt, 'MM.DD')

select wait.*, flight.*, arrival.* from (select count(*) as 대기 from route_fa where TO_CHAR(departure_date, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') and TO_CHAR(departure_date, 'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI') > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI') and TO_CHAR(arrival_date, 'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI') > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI') ) wait, (select count(*) as 비행 from route_fa where TO_CHAR(departure_date, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') and TO_CHAR(departure_date, 'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI') < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI') and TO_CHAR(arrival_date, 'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI') > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI') ) flight, (select count(*) as 도착 from route_fa where TO_CHAR(departure_date, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') and TO_CHAR(departure_date, 'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI') < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI') and TO_CHAR(arrival_date, 'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI') < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI') ) arrival

select last.*, ROUND(RATIO_TO_REPORT(last.count) OVER(), 2) * 100 AS rate from ( select d.continents as continents, count(*) count from destination_fa d, route_fa rou where rou.arrival_name = d.airport_name group by continents) last

select * from ( select r.reservation_num, c.customer_name, rou.departure_name, rou.arrival_name, r.payment, r.reservation_date from reservation_fa r, schedule_fa s ,route_fa rou, customer_fa c where r.reservation_num = s.reservation_num and s.route_num = rou.route_num and c.customer_id = r.customer_id and c.customer_name = s.passenger_name group by r.reservation_num, c.customer_name, rou.departure_name, rou.arrival_name, r.payment, r.reservation_date order by r.reservation_date desc, reservation_num desc) where rownum <=5
